metadata.name: Free White Kite
metadata.description:
Once existed a green demon inside,
Telling her stories of a deadly parasite.
Her mind and body against her spirit conspired,
How could she survive the thought of suicide?
Her wings of freedom had been roughly tied,
Seemed she had to give up flying into the starry night.
She stretched her hands to the faraway light,
Begged to take her soul and end this torturing fight.
With her eyes half closed, she saw a free white kite,
She smiled and closed her eyes with delight.
In the infinite sky, she saw her soaring and dancing from the heart,
The sky was her home and she was its only light.

Free White Kite
Faezeh
